Description.Text: Hotel Il Poeta Dante is a classic 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Florence. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, a bar and a good location near Uffizi Gallery. Santa Croce is a striking basilica in the east of the city centre, boasting illustrious works of art and funerary monuments. Nearby places of interest include the prestigious Uffizi Gallery and the Biblioteca Nazionale Centrale di Firenze. There are several bus stops located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Florence destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 12sqm and decorated in a cosy style with bright tones and carpeted floors. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
